crystals.name: Amethyst

crystals.name: Rose Quartz
crystals.description: Stone of love, peace and harmony, Rose Quartz promotes compassion, self-care and love, peace, and emotional healing. It helps attract love and strengthens existing relationships. Rose Quartz is one of the greatest crystals for healing and bringing peace.

crystals.name: Citrine
crystals.description: Citrine is known for its cleansing properties, a physical cleanser and emotional purifier. Lemon or golden yellow in colour, this crystal connects to the solar plexus chakra and helps to clear and cleanse. It also promotes joy, optimism, and creative energy while dispelling negative energy. Can also help with bringing abundance, wealth, and prosperity.

physical: Improves Circulation and Flow in the Body

crystals.name: Selenite
